metadata.dc:author: Gómez Tomé, M V
Blanco González, A L
Llorca Ramón, G
Villegas Castaño, J L
metadata.dc:description: The evolution of two twin patients diagnosed of catatonic schizophrenia is studied, through their clinical history, and the incidence of affective factors on the evolution of their clinical chart is evaluated. With regard to the results, the diagnosis of schizoaffective disorder is postulated.
metadata.dc:title: Factores afectivos en la evolución de la catatonia: a propósito de dos casos de catatonia en gemelos.
[Affective factors in the evolution of catatonia: a report of two cases of catatonia in twins].
metadata.dc:publisher: Actas luso-espanolas de neurologia, psiquiatria y ciencias afines
